entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
